57.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

181.movie_plot: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

114.movie_plot: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.

222.movie_plot: A paranormal expert and his daughter bunk in an abandoned house populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one.

61.movie_plot: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.

6.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

39.movie_plot: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

176.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)
176.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

209.movie_plot: Two veteran salesmen dissect a sales pitch to a particular client, through their young protégé.

107.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

69.movie_plot: In England in the early 1930s, twenty-year-old Flora Poste, recently orphaned, and left with only one hundred pounds a year, goes to stay with distant relatives on Cold Comfort Farm. ...

213.movie_plot: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a rich family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.

162.movie_plot: An ingenue insinuates herself into the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

112.movie_plot: Two friends, a priest and a rabbi, fall in love with the same woman they knew in their youth, but the religious position of both men denies them romance.

139.movie_plot: A secret agent is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

202.movie_plot: An average aquarium cleaner house-sits for a gigolo, only to be forced to become one himself.

1.movie_plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

210.movie_plot: Nine noble families fight for control over the mythical lands of Westeros, while a forgotten race returns after being dormant for thousands of years.

193.movie_plot: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.

64.movie_plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

167.movie_plot: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

104.movie_plot: In New York in 1928, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.

24.movie_plot: In November 1984, the Soviet Union's best submarine captain in their newest sub violates orders and heads for the USA. Is he trying to defect or to start a war?

131.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

227.movie_plot: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group The Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

98.movie_plot: A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.

189.movie_plot: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

25.movie_plot: An all-out war looms when the discovery of a cure for mutations draws a line between the followers of Charles Xavier and those of Magneto.

156.movie_plot: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

184.movie_plot: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come.

233.movie_plot: One of the sons of Frankenstein finds his father's monster in a coma and revives him, only to find out he is controlled by Ygor who is bent on revenge.

19.movie_plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

93.movie_plot: The lives of several individuals intertwine as they go about their lives in their own unique ways, engaging in acts society as a whole might find disturbing in a desperate search for human connection.

51.movie_plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

3.movie_plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home in Kansas and help her friends as well.

127.movie_plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

95.movie_plot: After a simple jewelry heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

21.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)
21.movie_plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy a more powerful Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

134.movie_plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

108.movie_plot: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.

146.movie_plot: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

54.movie_name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
54.movie_plot: When Dr. Henry Jones, Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Dr. Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. must follow in his father's footsteps to stop the Nazis from getting their hands on the Holy Grail first.

101.movie_plot: A failing Italian restaurant run by two brothers gambles on one special night to try to save the business.

159.movie_plot: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

32.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

205.movie_plot: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

182.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

89.movie_plot: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.

218.movie_plot: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

71.movie_plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist, while both sides attempt to find balance between their personal and their professional lives.

116.movie_plot: Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.

188.movie_plot: With the help of a talking freeway billboard, a wacky weatherman tries to win the heart of an English newspaper reporter, who is struggling to make sense of the strange world of early 1990s Los Angeles.

166.movie_plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.
